data.title: Sky Italia: Jobs
data.meta_description: Sky Italia | 343,105 followers on LinkedIn. A job you ❤️ to talk about | Sky Italia is a media and entertainment company launched in 2003 and is part of Sky Group, Europe’s leading entertainment company with 23 million customers that is controlled by Comcast NBCUniversal. Sky delivers its pay offer via satellite, Internet and on DTT. NOW is the OTT service that allows to watch Sky’s cinema, entertainment and sports content in streaming.
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.
